item.title: Empire Building With Text Messages
item.description: Ever imagine being a leader, a guiding expert, the head of a powerful domain? Do you relish the idea of directing thousands of followers, no matter where they are? Want to make sure your valuable insights or secret information are seen while they’re still relevant? Or maybe you just want to organize an event, send special offers to your customers, or send urgent messages to all your employees, students, or members?

item.title: Democracy In a Cell Phone
item.description: At this very moment, the American Red Cross has already received $22 million in donations for Haiti earthquake relief through text messages, a number that is expected to climb even higher. This massive demonstration of support is considered groundbreaking, possibly indicating a societal shift rather than a one-time occurrence. The $22 million figure is impressive considering it was accumulated in approximately a week, with each donor contributing $10. This means millions of people acted independently yet almost simultaneously when the call for help was issued.
